description.compact: Commands are used as general task runners, specifically, they differ from sevices and other types of actions in that they should not communicate back to the caller.

docblock.description:
In fact, in order to ensure that a command adheres to this expectation, a utility function called `dispatch` is provided which will handle a command for you and will not return anything.
The `dispatch` call is also prefered to calling `handle` directly since Commands can be handled in different ways.
